img_text: Slimofswiv 50,765 Date: From: To: 08/08/2018 Chief Executive Taylor, Mr.David [Info] Jones Sold Subject: Mr. Taylor, Phil Jones and his agent have agreed on personal terms with Leicester City. The deal to sell Phil Jones for £10,700,000 has been finalised. The Board has allocated £9,000,000 to your current transfer budget. Sincerely Chief Executive 18 018
